argument.name: Record_Number_List
argument.description: The set of records to display in a layout.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the current table.

page.discussion: The CROSSLEVEL_RECORD_LIST() function uses the .RECNO_LIST_GET() method to set the current filter for the current table and retrieve the specified set of records.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script was put under a button on the Customer Information form of AlphaSports. It sets the current filter to all records where the Lastname field has a value greater than "M".
section.example: dim frm as P dim lst as C frm = form.view("Customer Information") lst = crosslevel_record_list("Lastname > \"M\"") ? lst = "2 3 4 6 7 9 11 15 16 17 21 23 25 28 31 35 36 37 40 41 44 46 49 50 53 57 60 "
